name: GetItSMS WhatsApp APIs
description:
Send And Receive WhatsApp Bulk Messages(WhatsApp Marketing Messages) Through Whatsapp Business API Gateway(WhatsApp Green Tick Verification). For the Purpose Of Sending Notifications, OTPs, Or Anything Else Using Our WhatsApp Business API (WhatsApp Official API) Or WhatsApp OTP API and WhatsApp Chatbot. For Demo Contact Us(+91-7976724242) Or Register Here - http://sms.getitsms.com/signup 

Shopify Integration - https://apps.shopify.com/wpplugins

api_methods.name: GetIT SMS WHATSAPP API
api_methods.description: We are providing bulk whatsapp sms services.To use our whatsapp bulk sms  service you need api key.Go through our application and get our service.

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp message to 919876543210 with the text 'Hello, your order has been shipped!' using id 45.

parameters.your_message: Hello, your order has been shipped!

utterances.utterance: Please send 'Your OTP code is 123456' to the number 918765432109 with id 45.
Send a bulk WhatsApp message saying 'Don't miss our sale starting tomorrow!' to 919123456789 with id 45.

parameters.your_message: Don't miss our sale starting tomorrow!

utterances.utterance: Send the message 'Your appointment is confirmed for next Monday' to 917654321098 using id 45.

parameters.your_message: Your appointment is confirmed for next Monday

utterances.utterance: Send WhatsApp notification 'Your package will arrive today' to 919998877665 with id 45.

Send 'Your subscription has been renewed successfully' to 919887766554 with id 45.

parameters.your_message: Your subscription has been renewed successfully

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp message 'Please verify your email address' to 919776655443 with id 45.
